## Use a published release of the HMT project

If you want to learn how use content from the HMT project archive, start with [a simple tutorial](./analyze.qmd) showing how to read all of the citable texts from a publshed release.  Find recipes for different kinds of analysis of material in published HMT releases in the [guides](../guides/) section of this site.

## Build a release 

To learn how the project is published in delimited-text form, see [this introduction](./publish.qmd).
